snippet: Middlesbrough have signed Spain forward Alvaro Negredo from Valencia on a season-long loan deal, the newly-promoted English Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Striker Negredo Joins Middlesbrough on Season-Long Loan
headline.print_headline: Striker Negredo Joins Middlesbrough on Season-Long Loan

lead_paragraph: Middlesbrough have signed Spain forward Alvaro Negredo from Valencia on a season-long loan deal, the newly-promoted English Premier League club said on Wednesday.

snippet: Swansea City captain Ashley Williams will be rested ahead of the European Championship and will not play in the club's remaining two Premier League games this season, manager Francesco Guidolin has said....

headline.main: Swansea Skipper Williams to Rest Ahead of Euro 2016 Tilt
headline.print_headline: Swansea Skipper Williams to Rest Ahead of Euro 2016 Tilt

lead_paragraph: Swansea City captain Ashley Williams will be rested ahead of the European Championship and will not play in the club's remaining two Premier League games this season, manager Francesco Guidolin has said.

snippet: Watford manager Quique Sanchez Flores has told the club's hierarchy it should value his work amid growing speculation over the Spaniard's future at Vicarage Road....

headline.main: Flores Says Wants to Be Valued for Work Done at Watford
headline.print_headline: Flores Says Wants to Be Valued for Work Done at Watford

lead_paragraph: Watford manager Quique Sanchez Flores has told the club's hierarchy it should value his work amid growing speculation over the Spaniard's future at Vicarage Road.

snippet: Former Manchester United winger Ryan Giggs passed up the opportunity to become Swansea City manager because the Premier League club did not match his ambitions....

headline.main: Giggs Says Swansea Were Unable to 'Match' His Ambitions
headline.print_headline: Giggs Says Swansea Were Unable to 'Match' His Ambitions

lead_paragraph: Former Manchester United winger Ryan Giggs passed up the opportunity to become Swansea City manager because the Premier League club did not match his ambitions.

snippet: Southampton have signed French right-back Jeremy Pied on a free transfer following his departure from French side Nice and added Crystal Palace goalkeeper Alex McCarthy for an undisclosed fee....

headline.main: Southampton Sign Defender Pied and Goalkeeper McCarthy
headline.print_headline: Southampton Sign Defender Pied and Goalkeeper McCarthy

lead_paragraph: Southampton have signed French right-back Jeremy Pied on a free transfer following his departure from French side Nice and added Crystal Palace goalkeeper Alex McCarthy for an undisclosed fee.

snippet: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe has expressed disappointment over the timing of a transfer bid for two of his players prior to Tuesday's 3-1 Premier League defeat by Manchester United at Old Trafford....

headline.main: Hammers Bid to Pick Cherries Leaves Manager Howe Fuming
headline.print_headline: Hammers Bid to Pick Cherries Leaves Manager Howe Fuming

lead_paragraph: Bournemouth manager Eddie Howe has expressed disappointment over the timing of a transfer bid for two of his players prior to Tuesday's 3-1 Premier League defeat by Manchester United at Old Trafford.

snippet: Liverpool full back Nathaniel Clyne is eager to end Manchester United's Europa League campaign after losing both Premier League matches against their arch rivals for a second successive season....

headline.main: Liverpool Seek Europa Win Over United After Domestic Woe
headline.print_headline: Liverpool Seek Europa Win Over United After Domestic Woe

lead_paragraph: Liverpool full back Nathaniel Clyne is eager to end Manchester United's Europa League campaign after losing both Premier League matches against their arch rivals for a second successive season.

snippet: Bolton Wanderers chairman Phil Gartside, who was also on the board of the Football Association, has died of cancer at the age of 63....

headline.main: Bolton Wanderers Chairman Gartside Dies at 63
headline.print_headline: Bolton Wanderers Chairman Gartside Dies at 63

lead_paragraph: Bolton Wanderers chairman Phil Gartside, who was also on the board of the Football Association, has died of cancer at the age of 63.

headline.main: Ake Header, Bojan Penalty Miss Give Bournemouth Victory
headline.print_headline: Ake Header, Bojan Penalty Miss Give Bournemouth Victory

snippet: Burnley captain Tom Heaton has signed a new four-year contract that will keep him at Turf Moor until 2020, the newly promoted Premier League club said on Wednesday....

headline.main: Burnley Captain Heaton Extends Contract to 2020
headline.print_headline: Burnley Captain Heaton Extends Contract to 2020

lead_paragraph: Burnley captain Tom Heaton has signed a new four-year contract that will keep him at Turf Moor until 2020, the newly promoted Premier League club said on Wednesday.
